General.Name: Savara Inc
General.Description: Savara Inc., a clinical stage biopharmaceutical company, focuses on rare respiratory diseases. The company's lead product candidate is molgramostim, an inhaled granulocyte-macrophage colony-stimulating factor, which is in Phase 3 development stage for the treatment of autoimmune pulmonary alveolar proteinosis. The company was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Langhorne, Pennsylvania.
General.Address: 1717 Langhorne Newtown Road, Langhorne, PA, United States, 19047
